name: OFF YOU GO
description:
First of all, We declare this project to be on HOLD for now, As we are working on a Game named LOST by us only!! Thanks for support~~. I leave the files for all the dev teams and players to download..

New Updates:

1.The Journey-The Village arena Added(only PC Version)

2.Minor Bug Fixes

If games seems dark in light, try changing graphics quality to low(for pc users)

This a pre-alpha version of OFF YOU GO. A type of stack game which is in development . Our idea is to make this game a multiplayer based game with a third person song-oriented journey. Please donate so that we can carry on with our work!!

Find more:

https://isolation-media.itch.io/
